add.title: Add testament
add.text: To add a testament choose the secrets, heirs and fill in the necessary information.

delete.title: Delete testament
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the testament {{testament}}?

edit.title: Edit testament
edit.text: Edit your testaments name, secrets and heirs.

add.title: Add heir
add.text: To add a new heir enter the id of it and extend it with a known name.

delete.title: Delete heir
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the heir {{heir}}?

edit.title: Edit heir
edit.text: Update the information of your heir.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.text: It seems you have not yet created your IOLO account. You wanna go for one?

add.title: Add secret
add.text: To add a new secret choose the category of it and fill in the necessary information.

delete.title: Delete secret
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the secret {{secret}}?

share.title: Share your ID
share.info: Sharing this QR code allows a person to register you as an heir.
